bibl.title: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, November 2, 1897

div1.p: Lazear fears that rain will prevent him from visiting Sweitzer. He invites her to come to town to hear a concert and spend the night.

div1.head: Letter from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, November 2, 1897
div1.p:
I wanted
to get out to see
you this afternoon
but fear the rain
will prevent it.

I want to propose
that you came in
tomorrow, hear the
concert and stay all
night. Beethoven's Ninth
Symphony will be given.
I hope you will come.
It is tomorrow Wednesday
